analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0x7f585b9130c64e9e9f470b618a7badd03d79ca7e.sol:
	Contract CR7Coin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x7f585b9130c64e9e9f470b618a7badd03d79ca7e.sol#227-228)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0x7f585b9130c64e9e9f470b618a7badd03d79ca7e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/7/0x7f585b9130c64e9e9f470b618a7badd03d79ca7e.sol#6-8): it allows old versions
